owl:NamedIndividual.sqo:hasOptionsQuery: [] ?regprop ?Region . ?regprop rdfs:label "BrainRegion" . BIND(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(?Region,"AvgTH","Average Thickness"),"TotalSA","Total Surface Area"),"RostralMiddleFrontal","Rostral Middle Frontal"),"InferiorParietal","Inferior Parietal") as ?RegionLabel)

?hasCohortProj rdfs:label "HasCohortProject (E)" . [] ?hasCohortProj ?CohortProjects . ?CohortProjects ?DemographicAttribute [] . ?DemographicAttribute rdfs:label ?OrDemographicAttributeLabel . FILTER ( REGEX(?OrDemographicAttributeLabel, "HasAge Mean") || REGEX(?OrDemographicAttributeLabel, "HasNumberOfParticipants") || REGEX(?OrDemographicAttributeLabel, "HasNumberOfMaleSex") || REGEX(?OrDemographicAttributeLabel, "HasNumberOfFemaleSex") ) BIND(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(?OrDemographicAttributeLabel,"leSe","le Se")," \\(E\\)",""),"NumberOf","Number Of "), "Has", "Has ") AS ?DemographicAttributeLabel)

owl:NamedIndividual.sqo:hasQuestionTemplate: Is the effect size of ?Genotype on ?BrainImagingTrait associated with ?DemographicAttribute
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Is the effect size of ?Genotype in ?Brain Imaging Trait associated with ?Demographic Attribute?
Is ?Brain Characteristic associated with ?Neurological Disorder in comparison to healthy controls?

owl:NamedIndividual.sqo:hasQuestionTemplate: What is the Effect Size of ?Genotype on ?Region ?BrainImagingTrait

owl:NamedIndividual.sqo:hasConstraintQuery: ?Cohorts a ?cohortClass . ?cohortClass rdfs:label "Cohort (E)" . ?Cohorts ?hasEthnicGroupProp ?EthnicGroup . ?hasEthnicGroupProp rdfs:label "HasEthnicGroup (E)" . ?Cohorts ?hasCohortProj ?CohortProjects . ?hasCohortProj rdfs:label "HasCohortProject (E)" . ?CohortProjects ?DemographicAttribute [] . ?DemographicAttribute rdfs:label ?DemographicAttributeLabel . FILTER ( REGEX(?DemographicAttributeLabel, "HasAge Mean") || REGEX(?DemographicAttributeLabel, "HasNumberOfParticipants") || REGEX(?DemographicAttributeLabel, "HasNumberOfMaleSex") || REGEX(?DemographicAttributeLabel, "HasNumberOfFemaleSex") ) ?CohortProjects ?hasProjectResults ?ProjectResults . ?hasProjectResults rdfs:label "HasProjectResults (E)" . ?ProjectResults ?regionprop ?Region . ?regionprop rdfs:label "BrainRegion" . ?ProjectResults ?traitprop ?BrainImagingTrait . ?traitprop rdfs:label "Trait" . ?ProjectResults ?snpprop ?Genotype . ?snpprop rdfs:label "SNP" . ?ProjectResults ?contenturlProp ?CohortData . ?contenturlProp rdfs:label "HasContentUrl (E)" .

owl:NamedIndividual.sqo:hasConstraintQuery: ?Cohorts a ?cohortClass . ?cohortClass rdfs:label "Cohort (E)" . ?Cohorts ?hasEthnicGroupProp ?EthnicGroup . ?hasEthnicGroupProp rdfs:label "HasEthnicGroup (E)" . ?Cohorts ?hasCohortProj ?CohortProjects . ?hasCohortProj rdfs:label "HasCohortProject (E)" . ?CohortProjects ?hasProjectResults ?ProjectResults . ?hasProjectResults rdfs:label "HasProjectResults (E)" . ?ProjectResults ?regionprop ?Region . ?regionprop rdfs:label "BrainRegion" . ?ProjectResults ?traitprop ?BrainImagingTrait . ?traitprop rdfs:label "Trait" . ?ProjectResults ?snpprop ?Genotype . ?snpprop rdfs:label "SNP" . ?ProjectResults ?contenturlProp ?CohortData . ?contenturlProp rdfs:label "HasContentUrl (E)" .
